title: Aram Queue Forever
body:
20+, 30+ 55+ Minutes sometimes? Although "approx 3 minutes"

Why is it taking so long these days - is just no one playing?

replies.body:
ARAM queues in the early morning are hella slow, that's why the RGMs aren't open at these hours, cause very few people are awake, fewer again playing League, and even fewer playing alternate gamemodes.

If you play at more regular times (12pm-10pm) your queues out to be pretty consistent at <3mins.
